<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/rust/02_simple/source.rs">

struct struct SourceFile {
    pub path: String,
}

struct trait Summarizable;

struct impl SourceFile;

impl impl SourceFile {
    pub fn new(path: String, content: String) -> Self
}

struct impl Summarizable for SourceFile;

struct trait FileOperations;

struct enum FileError {
    pub NotFound: ,
    pub PermissionDenied: ,
    pub InvalidContent: ,
}

struct impl FileOperations for SourceFile;
</file>
